item.title: Title of the Guideline
item.description: This is a guideline, some parts are optional (if there’s no content, remove the whole paragraph). <Created by (company), Described by (company)> Description In depth description on what this Pattern is all about basic components how the interact steps to implement considerations to take Bad code PutCodeblocksHere() Good code PutCodeblocksHere() Discussions <Please replace the “TITLEOFYOURGUIDELINEGOESHERE” in the link above, with the Title+of+the+Guideline (indeed, with “space” replaced by a “+") - and remove this line.

item.title: Title of the pattern
item.description: This is a guideline, some parts are optional (if there’s no content, remove the whole paragraph). <Created by (company), Described by (company)> Abstract Short, descriptive and easy to remember description of this pattern. Context Sets the stage where the pattern takes place. 1-2 sentences. Problem What happens before this pattern is used? How can it go wrong? 1-5 lines. Description In depth description on what this Pattern is all about
